segments.text: May I take your order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , bring me a bottle of wine and filet steak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want some salad dressing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what kind do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have Italian , French , thousand island and blue cheese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think French will be fine .
segments.speaker: S2
